title: Selendang (shoulder Cloth), 1900–69
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft patterning and discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Long narrow shoulder cloth (selendang) with deep borders at each end. Field patterned by a sparse all-over pattern of X and O-like motifs in gold, separated by narrow black and white bands on a deep red ground. Each border is patterned by a series of bands in gold, yellow, black, ivory or red, all of them geometric, with one dominating. The ground is also deep red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Selendang (shoulder Cloth), 1900–69.Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft patterning and discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). 1969-170-12.
